## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description          | Type      | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | -------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `idCheck`   | `id-check`   | Id input checkbox    | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `isChecked` | `is-checked` | Value input checkbox | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `nameCheck` | `name-check` | Name input checkbox  | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `text`      | `text`       | Text label           | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event           | Description                       | Type               |
| --------------- | --------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `checkedChange` | Fire outside value input checkbox | `CustomEvent<any>` |
